amendment.description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 116-61 to require HHS to submit to Congress a report on the extent to which increases in the prices of commonly prescribed drugs have caused individuals with health insurance to forego needed treatment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Ms. Waters.
